levelList.name: วิชาขวานไฟฟ้า - ขยี้
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Consume 5 [Charge] จำนวนครั้ง on self to gain Coin Power +1 (max 2)
[BeforeAttack] If this unit consumed 5+ [Charge] จำนวนครั้ง, สร้าง +1 more [Burst]
[BeforeAttack] Is this unit consumed 10 [Charge] จำนวนครั้ง, สร้าง +3 [Burst] จำนวนครั้ง

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง 3 [Burst] for every 5 [Charge] จำนวนครั้ง consumed On Use

levelList.name: Frantic Pummel
levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] At 50%- HP, convert the third Coin of this Skill to [SuperCoin]
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 4 [Burst] on target (max 2)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง 1 [Burst] and +3 [Burst] จำนวนครั้ง
[WinDuelAttack] Heal ([DefenseUp] Stack on self)% HP on self (max 10%)

[OnSucceedAttackHead] Heal 1 other ally with the least HP percentage by 5% of this unit's Max HP

levelList.name: Frantic Volley

[WinDuelAttack] Heal 2 allies, including this unit, with the least HP percentage by 10% of this unit's Max HP

levelList.name: Spirit Talisman School - Vile Burst
levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] Atk Weight +1, Final Power +1 for every 10 SP below 0 (max 3 each)
[DefeatDuel] Reduce this Skill's Base Power by 75% (rounded down); also, this Skill's damage or effect cannot stagger the target(s)
[EndSkill] Reset SP to 0

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง 3 [Burst] and +3 [Burst] จำนวนครั้ง
